original_text: And stand in the holy place according to the divisions of the families of the fathers of your brethren the people, and after the division of the families of the Levites.
korean_text: 너희 형제 모든 백성의 족속의 서열대로 또는 레위 족속의 서열대로 성소에 서서

sentences.original_text: And stand in the holy place
according to the divisions of the families
of the fathers of your brethren the people
and after the division of the families
